alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Comal; Hays; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hays, southern Blanco, northeastern Kendall and north central Comal Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Johnson City, or 10 miles northeast of Blanco, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dripping Springs, Wimberley, Blanco, Canyon Lake, Johnson City, Woodcreek, Flugrath, Kendalia, Fischer, Spring Branch, Twin Sisters, Henly, Payton, Pedernales Falls State Park, Driftwood, Guadalupe River State Park, Mount Gainor, and Honey Creek State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
